exterior.title: Landscaping and Curb Appeal Enhancement
exterior.description: Improve the front yard landscaping by adding new plants, shrubs, and a small garden. Update the walkway with modern pavers and add outdoor lighting to enhance curb appeal.

exterior.title: Backyard Deck and Patio Installation
exterior.description: Install a wooden deck and stone patio in the backyard to create an outdoor living space. Include built-in seating and a fire pit for added functionality.

exterior.title: Exterior Painting and Siding Update
exterior.description: Repaint the exterior of the house and update any worn siding. Choose a modern color palette to give the home a fresh look.

exterior.title: Fence Repair and Staining
exterior.description: Repair any damaged sections of the fence and apply a fresh coat of stain to improve the overall appearance and longevity.

exterior.title: Driveway Resurfacing
exterior.description: Resurface the driveway to remove cracks and stains. Consider adding a decorative border to enhance the visual appeal.

living area.title: Open Concept Living Area
living area.description: Remove the wall between the living room and dining area to create an open concept space. This will modernize the home and make it more appealing to buyers looking for open floor plans.

living area.title: Update Lighting Fixtures
living area.description: Replace outdated lighting fixtures with modern, energy-efficient options. This will enhance the ambiance and appeal of the living spaces.

living area.title: Flooring Upgrade
living area.description: Replace the existing carpet in the living room with hardwood or high-quality laminate flooring. This will add value and appeal to the property.

living area.title: Fresh Paint
living area.description: Repaint the living areas with neutral, modern colors to make the space feel larger and more inviting. This is a cost-effective way to refresh the home.

living area.title: Window Replacement
living area.description: Replace old windows with energy-efficient models to improve insulation and reduce energy costs. This will also enhance the aesthetic appeal of the home.

kitchen.title: Cabinet Refinishing
kitchen.description: Refinish the existing wooden cabinets to give them a modern look. This involves sanding, painting, or staining the cabinets to match contemporary styles.

kitchen.title: Lighting Upgrade
kitchen.description: Replace the existing light fixtures with modern, energy-efficient LED lighting. Consider under-cabinet lighting to enhance the workspace.

kitchen.title: Backsplash Update
kitchen.description: Install a new, stylish backsplash to replace the current one. Choose a design that complements the countertops and cabinets.

kitchen.title: Flooring Enhancement
kitchen.description: Replace the existing tile flooring with modern vinyl or laminate flooring that is durable and easy to maintain.

kitchen.title: Hardware Replacement
kitchen.description: Update the cabinet and drawer handles with modern hardware to give the kitchen a fresh look.

other.title: Laundry Room Upgrade
other.description: Upgrade the laundry room with new energy-efficient appliances, add a countertop for folding, and install better lighting. This will enhance functionality and appeal to potential buyers.

other.title: Home Office Enhancement
other.description: Enhance the home office with built-in shelving and better lighting. This will make the space more functional and attractive, especially for remote workers.

other.title: Basement Storage Optimization
other.description: Optimize the basement storage area with custom shelving and organization systems. This will maximize space and appeal to buyers looking for storage solutions.

bath.title: Upgrade Bathroom Fixtures
bath.description: Replace outdated fixtures such as faucets, showerheads, and cabinet handles with modern, water-efficient models. This can enhance the bathroom's appearance and improve water efficiency.

bath.title: Install New Lighting
bath.description: Upgrade the lighting fixtures to modern, energy-efficient LED lights. Consider adding dimmable options for a more versatile lighting setup.

bath.title: Tile Replacement
bath.description: Replace the existing tiles with high-quality, modern tiles. This can significantly enhance the aesthetic appeal and value of the bathroom.

bath.title: Repaint Walls
bath.description: Apply a fresh coat of paint in a neutral color to make the space feel larger and more inviting. This is a cost-effective way to refresh the bathroom's look.

bath.title: Vanity Upgrade
bath.description: Replace the existing vanity with a modern, space-efficient model that includes storage solutions. This can improve functionality and aesthetics.

bedroom.title: Update Lighting Fixtures
bedroom.description: Replace outdated ceiling fans and light fixtures with modern, energy-efficient LED lighting to enhance the room's ambiance and appeal.

bedroom.title: Paint and Accent Walls
bedroom.description: Repaint the bedrooms with neutral, modern colors and add an accent wall to create a fresh and inviting look.

bedroom.title: Upgrade Flooring
bedroom.description: Replace existing flooring with high-quality laminate or hardwood to increase durability and aesthetic appeal.

bedroom.title: Install Built-in Storage
bedroom.description: Add built-in storage solutions like shelves or closet organizers to maximize space and functionality.

bedroom.title: Window Treatments
bedroom.description: Update window treatments with modern blinds or curtains to improve privacy and style.
